content.p: Two {{vehicles}} are {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart and heading toward each other. One is traveling at {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } and the other at {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }. After how much time will they meet?

A pair of {{vehicles}} are heading directly towards one another from an initial distance of {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} }. The first moves at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } while the second moves at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }. How long will it take for the two {{vehicles}} to meet in the middle?

Two trains are {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart and traveling toward each other. One train is traveling {{rate_diff}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } {{faster_slower}} than the other. If they meet after \displaystyle {{time}} hours, at what rate is each train moving?

outtro.p: One is traveling at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }, and the other is traveling at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }.

content.p: A pair of {{vehicles}} are heading directly towards one another from an initial distance of {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} }. The first moves at a rate of {{rate_diff}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } {{faster_slower}} than the second, and they eventually meet in the middle after \displaystyle {{time}} hours. How fast is each of the {{vehicles}} moving?

outtro.p: One is traveling at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }, and the other is traveling at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }.

content.p: Two {{vehicles}} leave from the same location at the same time, one traveling {{direction1}} and the other traveling {{direction2}}. One is traveling at {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } and the other at {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }. How much time will pass before these {{vehicles}} are {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart?

A pair of {{vehicles}} are heading directly away one another, one heading {{direction1}} and the other heading {{direction2}}. The first moves at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } while the second moves at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }. How long will it take for the two {{vehicles}} to be {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart?

Two {{vehicles}} leave from the same location at the same time, one traveling {{direction1}} and the other traveling {{direction2}}. One is traveling {{rate_diff}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } {{faster_slower}} than the other. If it takes \displaystyle {{time}} hours for the {{vehicles}} to end up {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart, how fast are they traveling?

outtro.p: One is traveling at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }, and the other is traveling at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }.

content.p: A pair of {{vehicles}} are heading directly away from one another from the same location, one headed {{direction1}} and the other headed {{direction2}}, and after \displaystyle {{time}} hours they are {{dist}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}} } apart. If the first moves at a rate of {{rate_diff}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr } {{faster_slower}} than the second, how fast is each of the {{vehicles}} moving?

outtro.p: One is traveling at a rate of {{rate1}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }, and the other is traveling at a rate of {{rate2}} \,\mathrm{ {{d_unit}}/hr }.

content.p: In {{name}}'s candy shop, they purchase {{ingredient1}} from their distributor at a cost of \${{part1}} per {{weight}}, and {{ingredient2}} at a cost of \${{part2}} per {{weight}}. {{name}} uses these to prepare a {{ingredient1}}-{{ingredient2}} candy, using a mixture that ends up costing \${{mixpart}} per {{weight}}. How much {{ingredient1}} and {{ingredient2}} is used to create {{totalamount}} {{weight}} of the mixture?

{{name}} has two investment accounts, one earning {{apr1}}\% annual interest and the other earning {{apr2}}\% annual interest. After one year, the original investment of \${{totalinvestment}} has earned \${{totalinterest}} in interest. How much was invested in each account?

{{name}} has two one-year loans, one costing {{apr1}}\% annual interest and the other costing {{apr2}}\% annual interest. To pay off these loans, {{name}} must repay the total \${{totalinvestment}} loaned in addition to \${{totalinterest}} total interest. How much money was loaned at each rate?

A hamburger blend is made using {{part1}}\% ground {{meat1}} that has {{percent1}}\% fat content, and {{part2}}\% ground {{meat2}} that has {{percent2}}\% fat content. What is the fat percentage of the hamburger blend?

A juice cocktail mixes {{part1}}\% {{juice1}} with {{part2}}\% {{juice2}}. If {{juice1}} contains {{percent1}}\% sugar, and {{juice2}} contains {{percent2}}\% sugar, what percentage of the juice cocktail is sugar?
